scripts.version:sync:prod-rc: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all) && $RT scripts/sync-version-from-git.js prod rc
scripts.version:sync:prod: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)    && $RT scripts/sync-version-from-git.js prod release
scripts.build:all: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)          && $PM run version:sync && $PM run build:transformer && $PM run build
scripts.build:pack: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)         && $PM run version:sync && tspc -p tsconfig.pack.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pack.json
scripts.build:pack:dev: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)     && $PM run version:sync:dev && tspc -p tsconfig.pack.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pack.json
scripts.build:pack:prod-rc: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all) && $PM run version:sync:prod-rc && tspc -p tsconfig.pack.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pack.json
scripts.build:pack:prod: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)    && $PM run version:sync:prod && tspc -p tsconfig.pack.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.pack.json
scripts.build:all:pack: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)     && $PM run version:sync && $PM run build:transformer && $PM run build:pack
scripts.pack: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all) && $PM run clean && $PM run build:all:pack && $PACK && cp symbolica-agentica-$($RT scripts/get-package-version.cjs).tgz symbolica-agentica-latest.tgz
scripts.pack:dev: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)     && $PM run version:sync:dev  && $PM run clean && $PM run build:transformer && $PM run build:pack:dev && $PACK && cp symbolica-agentica-$($RT scripts/get-package-version.cjs).tgz symbolica-agentica-latest-dev.tgz
scripts.pack:prod-rc: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all) && $PM run version:sync:prod-rc && $PM run clean && $PM run build:transformer && $PM run build:pack:prod-rc && $PACK && cp symbolica-agentica-$($RT scripts/get-package-version.cjs).tgz symbolica-agentica-latest-prod-rc.tgz
scripts.pack:prod: eval $(sh scripts/detect-pm.sh all)    && $PM run version:sync:prod && $PM run clean && $PM run build:transformer && $PM run build:pack:prod && $PACK && cp symbolica-agentica-$($RT scripts/get-package-version.cjs).tgz symbolica-agentica-latest-prod.tgz
